name: Kenneth Zimny
intro: Accomplished software developer with extensive experience in frontend development, complemented by skills in full-stack and embedded systems. Known for creating secure, scalable, and high-performing web applications that align technical strategies with business objectives. Adept at building responsive websites, enhancing business features, and delivering impactful user experiences using tools such as React and Adobe Experience Manager (AEM). Brings a proven ability to thrive in diverse roles—whether as a sole developer, business owner, or collaborative team contributor—while demonstrating strong problem-solving, organizational, and communication skills.
